text: <start_of_turn>user # What is Babu Banarasi Das University also known as? <end_of_turn><start_of_turn>model # Babu Banarasi Das University is also known as BBD University. <end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user # Where is the main campus of BBD University located? <end_of_turn><start_of_turn>model # The main campus of BBD University is located in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India. <end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>user # Who established BBD University and in which year? <end_of_turn><start_of_turn>model # BBD University was established by Akhilesh Das in 2010. <end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user # After whom is BBD University named? <end_of_turn><start_of_turn>model # BBD University is named after Babu Banarasi Das, the father of Akhilesh Das and a former Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh. <end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user # How was BBD University incepted? <end_of_turn><start_of_turn>model # BBD University was incepted by an Act (No. 25 of 2010) of State Legislature of Uttar Pradesh as a State Private University. <end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user # What authority empowered BBD University to award degrees? <end_of_turn><start_of_turn>model # The UGC empowered BBD University to award degrees under section 22 of the UGC Act, 1956, via letter no 8-30/2010(CPP-I/PU) dated 17 February 2011. <end_of_turn>
